{"id":980599438,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1687847025,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/980599438/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Strength of a Group","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long fxn(vector<int>& nums, int n, int ind, long long curProduct) {\n        if (ind == n) {\n            return curProduct;\n        }\n        \n        long long take = fxn(nums, n, ind + 1, curProduct * nums[ind]);\n        long long ntake = fxn(nums, n, ind + 1, curProduct);\n        \n        return max({take, ntake, 0LL});\n    }\n\n    long long maxStrength(vector<int>& nums) {\n        return fxn(nums, nums.size(), 0, 1);\n    }\n};\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-strength-of-a-group","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
